product_name: lucy Lotus Power Capri Pants - Women's
long_description: These formfitting lucy Lotus Power capri pants keep you covered through all your asanas, from lotus pose to downward facing dog. Nylon/spandex blend provides compressive support, moisture wicking performance and ample stretch for yoga, Pilates or other workouts. Elliptical waistband offers stylish low rise in the front while maintaining ample coverage in the back. Slit vents at back of the knees accommodate a wide range of motion. Flatlock seams discourage chafing. lucy Lotus Power capri pants feature an interior pocket for cash and keys.
short_description: These formfitting lucy Lotus Power capri pants keep you covered through all your asanas, from lotus pose to downward facing dog.
